constantValues: Physical piece of equipment of considerable value such as a vehicle or a device such as an excavator, that can be tracked through its entire life cycle of trade, ownership and service and may be related to one or more customers over time.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: businessOperationId

constantValues: Department/team at business operation responsible for vehicle or device.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Department/team at business operation responsible for vehicle or device.

members.name: chassisNumber

constantValues: Unique number for the vehicle's engine; last 6 digits of the VIN.

members.description: Unique number for the vehicle's engine; last 6 digits of the VIN.

members.name: condition

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Current condition of the vehicle or device (excellent, good, fair, poor or unknown).

members.description: Current condition of the vehicle or device (excellent, good, fair, poor or unknown).

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'condition_display' is added to the 'Device' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'condition'

constantValues: Description of the vehicle or device.

constantValues: Model of the vehicle or device.

members.name: deviceNumber

constantValues: Unique number of the vehicle or device.

members.description: Unique number of the vehicle or device.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: deviceStateId

constantValues: Status of the vehicle or device, which may represent a given combination of inventory, ownership and trade status.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Status of the vehicle or device, which may represent a given combination of inventory, ownership and trade status.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: deviceStyleId

constantValues: Body style of the vehicle or device.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Body style of the vehicle or device.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: deviceTypeId

constantValues: Type of this vehicle or device.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Type of this vehicle or device.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: deviceVariantId

constantValues: Specific configuration for this vehicle or device.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Specific configuration for this vehicle or device.

members.name: listPrice

constantValues: Sale price of vehicle or device.

members.description: Sale price of vehicle or device.

members.name: listPriceBase

constantValues: Value of the List Price in base currency.

members.description: Value of the List Price in base currency.

members.name: listPriceComments

constantValues: Comments regarding the listed price for this vehicle or device.

members.description: Comments regarding the listed price for this vehicle or device.

members.name: name

constantValues: Name of the vehicle or device.

members.description: Name of the vehicle or device.

members.name: registrationNumber

constantValues: Registration number for this vehicle or device.

members.description: Registration number for this vehicle or device.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: specificationId

constantValues: Specification tied to this vehicle or device.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Specification tied to this vehicle or device.

members.name: vendorsStockNumber

constantValues: Stock number for vehicle or device.

members.description: Stock number for vehicle or device.

members.name: VIN

constantValues: Unique code used to identify an vehicle or device.

members.description: Unique code used to identify an vehicle or device.

members.name: year

constantValues: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.

definitions.description: Physical piece of equipment of considerable value such as a vehicle or a device such as an excavator, that can be tracked through its entire life cycle of trade, ownership and service and may be related to one or more customers over time.
